Fwd: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein
From Lee Plourde
To Lamine N'Diaye
Date 2019/08/11 13:12
Subject: Fwd: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: [b(6), b(7)(C)] <[b(6)]@thedailybeast.com>
Date: 8/11/19 12:54 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: Lee Plourde [b(6)] @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein
>> [b(6), b(7)(C)] 08/11/2019 12:54 >>
... This graph is pretty explosive: A person with a knowledge of the investigation said that when the decision was made to remove Mr. Epstein from suicide watch
But that was apparently not done, the person said.
[b(6), b(7)(C)]
Senior Editor, writer
The Daily Beast
M: 267-257-[b(6)]
Facebook, Twitter, Instagram: @ [b(6)]
From: [b(6), b(7)(C)]
Sent: Sunday, August 11, 2019 12:52:21 PM
To: Lee Plourde [b(6)] @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein
Hi, I know you are busy. Following up on this. Also wondering about a few details I see out there:
was this already known? In addition, the jail had transferred his cellmate and allowed Mr. Epstein to be housed alone in a cell just two weeks after he had
[b(6), b(7)(C)]
Senior Editor, writer
The Daily Beast
M: 267-257-[b(6)]
Facebook, Twitter, Instagram: @ [b(6)]
From: [b(6), b(7)(C)]
Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 3:17:52 PM
To: Lee Plourde [b(6)] @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein
Thanks, Lee.
1. When was Epstein taken off suicide watch?
2. How long was he on suicide watch?
3. What unit in the jail was he housed?
4. Was he by himself?
5. What's his protocol for watching him at 6:30 in the morning? And in general during a 24 hour period?
6. Is there an internal investigation? Are the guard(s) and/or supervisors placed on modified duty/or some sort of restricted duty while there is an ongoing
7. Are there surveillance cameras? If so what do they show?
8. What did he use to hang himself?
[b(6), b(7)(C)]
Senior Editor, writer
The Daily Beast
M: 267-257-[b(6)]
Facebook, Twitter, Instagram: @ [b(6), b(7)(C)]
From: Lee Plourde [b(6)] @bop.gov>
To: [b(6), b(7)(C)] @thedailybeast.com>
Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 3:10 PM
Subject: Re: Fwd: Jeffrey Epstein

Thanks, Lee.

additional_notes: The document appears to be an email chain discussing Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody. The emails are redacted, with some information removed for privacy or security reasons.
